ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined
ygData.msgSnippet: Kind of... would have been worse but the person who s son broke it bought us a new one :) Since it was out of warranty :) So I wasn t going to complain ...
ygData.messageBody:
Kind of... would have been worse but the person who's son broke it bought us
a new one :) Since it was out of warranty :) So I wasn't going to complain
:)

----- Original Message -----
From: "Howler D. Wolfe" <howler@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, February 22, 2003 2:56 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined


> OUCH! That had to hurt. I hope the repairs weren't too costly.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Jeffrey Willis" <thor@...>
> To: <EQ_Necromancer@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Saturday, February 22, 2003 3:47 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined
>
>
> > My problem was I got accepted into the beta and before the disk came a
> > friend's kid pulled the PS2 down and broke it :) hehe just got it fixed
> > after beta of course :(
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "Howler D. Wolfe" <howler@...>
> > To: <EQ_Necromancer@yahoogroups.com>
> > Sent: Saturday, February 22, 2003 2:40 PM
> > Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined
> >
> >
> > > Hi Xurtin,
> > >
> > > I was in all three BETAs for EQOA. I think if you are comming from the
> PC
> > > version of EQ, even if its been a while since you last played, that
you
> > will
> > > probably be a little disappointed. The graphics are ok, but the game
> play
> > > mechanics were just not my cup of tea.
> > >
> > > Then again, I'm sure they've made huge strides since I last played the
> PS2
> > > BETA, so its probably worth it to try it out for yourself and make
your
> > own
> > > conclusions.
> > >
> > > I know its not much info, but its really all I have. I hope this
helped
> > you
> > > in some way. :-)
> > >
> > > -Oskar
